name: 5 Minutes To Burn
description:
Hello Vampire, 

You are late returning home from the village. You must get back to your castle before the sun rises. Run, Jump, and Dash your way through the various obstacles to climb the mountain. Hurry! You can only last 5 seconds in the sun before you must cooldown in the shade. You better be home in 5 minutes or else the sun will rise fully and you will perish.

Controls: 

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Dash: Arrow Keys - 8 Different directions

Red Orbs: Dash Recharge

Shade: Checkpoints
